page.title: 16 STREET GAMES IN AYR
page.content:
{Kerby}is a game for two people. You need a road with the kerbs not too far apart and a highly inflated ball. The object of the game is to throw the ball to make it bounce off the edge and come back to you. If you succeed you score a point. {British Bulldog}is a game for lots of players. You pick someone to be{ {het.}Then draw two straight chalk lines on the ground about 10m. apart. The other players run from one line to the other while the het player tries to catch them before they are{safe} behind a line.
{ Het:}the child chosen to be the chaser.
